title: Ahead of the Season
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>*Huff*, *huff*.... Haaaa~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Phew.... Do you guys always run this route, Ruby-chan? It’s pretty tough.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Y-, yeah.... The stairs at the end are especially hard~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, here, some water.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Thank you. *Gulp gulp*.... Aaaah, Ruby feels alive again~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>....Huh? The leaves around that part have already changed colors, haven’t they?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eh? Aaah, yeah. The top of the mountains usually changes before the rest.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Wow, that’s quite early. It’s nice, huh? Makes you feel like you’re ahead of the season.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe, doesn’t it? We get to enjoy the gradual color shift, so we usually forget all the pain from running.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s so wonderful to be able to feel the seasons while practicing. Let me practice with you again sometimes, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
